comment.author: 51039499@N08
comment._content: My godchild,mark castille is an engineer at boeing, presently working out of a city near cairo,egypt. I know he will love viewing these photos too!!!.  Such  an outstanding imagery collection of  documentary history offered on  an amazing  public forum. Thank you. Peggy hall, from louisiana

comment.author: 44494372@N05
comment._content:
Hi, Peggy,  
Glad you like the photos!  Hope Mark gets a chance to look at them, too :-)  
The technical and personal comments we're getting on the photos are awesome!
